title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Skills: Embodied Cognition and Mathematics Education: Practical Learning for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more educational activities explaining mathematical concepts based on embodied cognition theory.

Educators can design three math instruction models (e.g., geometric manipulation, graph visualization, problem-solving simulations) that engage learners aged 40+ using iPads and motion sensors (e.g., Leap Motion). Over eight weeks, they develop prototypes applicable to five or more 40-minute lesson scenarios and meet four or more of the five evaluation rubric criteria (technology integration, engagement, effectiveness, creativity, scalability).
Learners demonstrate an 80%+ achievement in participation rates and a 20% improvement in conceptual understanding through project outcomes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
